key.title: Key
key.description: A URL-friendly name of the organization (i.e: slug). You will be able to query later using this key instead of the id (UUID) of the organization.

created_at.title: Created At
created_at.description: Date and time when the organization was created (ISO_8601 format).

updated_at.title: Updated At
updated_at.description: Date and time when the organization was last updated/modified (ISO_8601 format).

name.title: Name
name.description: The name of the organization, usually it's your company's name.
